title: Cant download and i fear for my sanity
body: League obviously hates me. I'm running it on Macintosh which was clearly doomed from the start. sometimes when i try to open league it says unspecified logs error, and when i try to reinstall and then open it again the logo just disappears. it used to be that i would have to reinstall wait a day and then it would be good but that doesn't even work anymore. i try to download it again (instead of reopening the original dmg) it just comes up with http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Mac_ShellInstaller/OC1/League%20of%20Legends%20OC1.dmg. please help me or i will continue to {{item:3070}}  every time
